name: religion
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
B1 [ C or U ] the belief in and worship of a god or gods, or any such system of belief and worship: the Christian religion
[ C ] informal an activity that someone is extremely enthusiastic about and does regularly: Football is a religion for these people.
More examplesFewer examplesIt seems to me that a lot of evil deeds are done in the name of religion.What do you think is the role of religion in the modern world?The new government has promised all citizens the right to practise their religion.She has strong opinions about religion.This temple is a place of great holiness for the religion's followers.
